title: Permissions giude didnt work what do i do?
body: Every time i try to launch league of legends nothing happens and the launcher dissapears i was recommended the steps in the permission guide but they didnt work what do i do now

replies.body:
Have you since restarted your PC?  No worries, hit us up in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) and our tech team will help you directly.

Download our [hextech repair tool](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367) as well to grab some logs, and attach it for more context.  See you there!
